content: Once you’ve cleared the hall of Withered Corpses, look where the one hiding behind several large pots was, and you can find an altar with a gold pot. Open it, and you’ll receive a **Celestial Jade Lotus Pill** , massively improving your maximum health!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Crouching_Tiger_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Crouching Tiger Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Temple Cellar'.
The content is as follows:
Once you’ve cleared the hall of Withered Corpses, look where the one hiding behind several large pots was, and you can find an altar with a gold pot. Open it, and you’ll receive a **Celestial Jade Lotus Pill** , massively improving your maximum health!
